description: A beef based Malaysian fried noodle dish with an intensely savoury sauce.
name: Minced Beef Mee Goreng with Red Onion Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the sauce ingredients and set to one side.
Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced, then place the potatoes on a roasting tray and bake for 20 minutes.
Cook the noodles as per the packet instructions, drain and set to one side.
Bring a pot of water to the boil and boil the eggs for 7 minutes, cool and remove their shells.
Heat up a wok or similar pan to medium heat with the canola oil and fry the mince alongside the garlic and diced onion for 7 minutes, turning while cooking.
Add the beansprouts to the pan with the noodles and fry together for 3 minutes.
Remove from the pan and serve with the roasted potato, a boiled egg and serve the sauce on the side.
